title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; identical API surface to JS SDK, async & sync clients, streaming support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, embedder and retriever components.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, embed, pull/push models with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, repl mode, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots; autocomplete, explain, refactor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN workflows; serverless SaaS or self-hosted.

title: ollama-litellm-proxy
summary: LiteLLM proxy adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints to any Ollama model; load-balancing, fallbacks, cost tracking.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-rag-qa-streamlit
summary: Streamlit demo app for RAG question-answering using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that chats with local Ollama models; slash commands, thread support, model switching.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows; chat & generate operations.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate for Ollama; async client, generate & chat, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; simple API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/push models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that integrates Ollama models into channels; mentions, threads, ephemeral responses.
